mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cash( book_id, member_id, cash_date, cash_kind, category_name, cash_price, cash_place, cash_memo ) VALUES ( #{bookId}, #{memberId}, #{cashDate}, #{cashKind}, #{categoryName}, #{cashPrice}, #{cashPlace}, #{cashMemo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET cash_kind = #{cashKind}, category_name = #{categoryName}, cash_price = #{cashPrice}, cash_place = #{cashPlace}, cash_memo = #{cashMemo} WHERE cash_no = #{cashNo}
mapper.select: SELECT book_id as bookId, SUM(CASE WHEN cash_kind='수입' THEN cash_price WHEN cash_kind='지출' THEN -cash_price END) as price FROM cash WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND YEAR(cash_date) = #{year} GROUP BY book_id

SELECT member_id as memberId, cash_date as cashDate, cash_kind as cashKind, category_name as categoryName, cash_price as cashPrice, cash_place as cashPlace, cash_memo as cashMemo FROM cash WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND book_id = #{bookId} AND cash_date = #{cashDate}
